bibl.title: Strategos and exactor in the Fourth Century: One Office or Two?
bibl.note: After 309, and probably from 307/8, there was no separate office of strategos. Whether the title used is §jãktvr, strathgÒw or strathgÚw ≥toi §jãktvr, only one and the same office is in question. <exaktor, strategos, strategos etoi exaktor>
THOMAS J. David, Strategos and exactor in the Fourth Century: One Office or Two?
